content.question: Which of the following describes the data in the graph?

choices.label: In 2003 household disposable income in Mexico was just over 5 percent.
In 2008 household disposable income in Mexico was roughly 2 percent.
Household disposable income in Mexico was highest in 2010.
Household disposable income in Mexico was lowest in 2013.

content.answer: In 2003 household disposable income in Mexico was just over 5 percent.

unit.text: 5: Political and Economic Changes and Development

topic.text: 5.1: Impact of Global Economic and Technological Forces
